Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Directs the secretary of state to prepare and distribute to cities, towns and villages criterion for a comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance
Summary: Directs the secretary of state to prepare and distribute to cities, towns and villages criterion for a comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance; updates general lighting restrictions.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L; amd ยง143, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the preparation and distribution of criterion for a comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance; and to amend the public buildings law, in relation to lighting restrictions
